_header: Saint John the gospeller says us / That to his disciples said
_description: Gospel for the Second Sunday after Easter in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospellere seiþ þusÞat to his
                    disciplus seide Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe seo bi a taleOf a ȝong mon þat
                    was not hale
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Dixit Ihesu discipulis suis Ego sum pastorum (f.
                    189va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte Ione þe gospellere saise vsþat till his dissiples
                    saide ihesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þis nay ȝe se bi a taleOf a ȝonge man þat
                    was vnhale
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Ione þe gospellere sais vsÞat til his disciples
                    saide ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And by a tale þat may we seÞat I wille telle if
                    þat ȝe here me
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post octava pasche secundum Iohannem (p.
                    188)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn þe Gospellere seyth vsÞat to his disciplis
                    seyde ihesusI am a good herde man…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…And þat may ȝe seen be a taleof a ȝong man þat
                    was not hale
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 2a post Pascha Euangelium secundum Iohannem (f.
                        122v)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint iohn þe godspellere sais vsvnto his folowers said ihesus…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat may men by ensaumple tellBy fore þir daies how it bifell
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ego sum pastor bonus & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica prima post octava pasche Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 90vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.193-196.

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospellere sayth vsþat to his folowerys said
                    ihesusI am gode hyrd bestis to kepeAnd gode hyrd settyth for his
                    schepe…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And þis may ȝe se by a taleOff a ȝong man
                    þat wos vnhale

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Iohn þe gospellere tell vsþat tyll hys disciples
                    sayd IhesusI am a gude hirde bestes to kepe…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe se here be a taleof a ȝong man
                    þat was vnhall
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica prima post octavas pasche Secundum Johannem (f.
                    86)
